name: Young Earth Dragon
senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 20

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its slam.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Scouring Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales scouring sand and stones in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw  taking 38 (11d6) slashing damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the dragon remains motionless within its linked area, it is indistinguishable from a natural rocky outcropping.

special_abilities.name: Essence Link
special_abilities.desc: The essence dragon is spiritually linked to a specific area or landmark. The dragon gains no benefit from a long rest when more than 1 mile away from its linked area. If the dragon dies, the area it is linked to loses its vital essence until it forms a new essence dragon, which can take centuries. When a creature first enters an area that has lost its vital essence in this way, they gain a level of fatigue and a level of strife. This fatigue and strife can be removed only by completing a long rest outside the area.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:locate animals or plants, spike growth
